verses.verse: אָדָ֥ם <S%H121><s%> 'a-Dam Adam שֵׁ֖ת <S%H8352><s%> shet Sheth אֱנֽוֹשׁ׃ <S%H583><s%> e-Noosh. Enosh
קֵינָ֥ן <S%H7018><s%> kei-Nan Kenan מַהֲלַלְאֵ֖ל <S%H4111><s%> ma-ha-lal-'El Mahalaleel יָֽרֶד׃ <S%H3382><s%> Ya-red. Jered
חֲנ֥וֹךְ <S%H2585><s%> cha-Noch Henoch מְתוּשֶׁ֖לַח <S%H4968><s%> me-tu-She-lach Methuselah לָֽמֶךְ׃ <S%H3929><s%> La-mech. Lamech
נֹ֥חַ <S%H5146><s%> No-ach Noah שֵׁ֖ם <S%H8035><s%> shem Shem חָ֥ם <S%H2526><s%> cham Ham וָיָֽפֶת׃ <S%H3315><s%> va-Ya-fet. and Japheth ס sa-Mek

בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei The sons יֶ֔פֶת <S%H3315><s%> Ye-fet, of Japheth גֹּ֣מֶר <S%H1586><s%> Go-mer Gomer וּמָג֔וֹג <S%H4031><s%> u-ma-Gog, and Magog וּמָדַ֖י <S%H4074><s%> u-ma-Dai and Madai וְיָוָ֣ן <S%H3120><s%> ve-ya-Van and Javan וְתֻבָ֑ל <S%H8422><s%> ve-tu-Val; and Tubal וּמֶ֖שֶׁךְ <S%H4902><s%> u-Me-shech and Meshech וְתִירָֽס׃ <S%H8494><s%> ve-ti-Ras. and Tiras ס sa-Mek

וּבְנֵ֖י <S%H1121><s%> u-ve-Nei And the sons גֹּ֑מֶר <S%H1586><s%> Go-mer; of Gomer אַשְׁכֲּנַ֥ז <S%H813><s%> 'ash-ka-Naz Ashchenaz וְדִיפַ֖ת <S%H7384><s%> ve-di-Fat and Riphath וְתוֹגַרְמָֽה׃ <S%H8425><s%> ve-to-gar-Mah. and Togarmah

וּבְנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> u-ve-Nei And the sons יָוָ֖ן <S%H3120><s%> ya-Van of Javan אֱלִישָׁ֣ה <S%H473><s%> 'e-li-Shah Elishah וְתַרְשִׁ֑ישָׁה <S%H8659><s%> ve-tar-Shi-shah; and Tarshish כִּתִּ֖ים <S%H3794><s%> kit-Tim Kittim וְרוֹדָנִֽים׃ <S%H1721><s%> ve-ro-da-Nim. and Dodanim ס sa-Mek

בְּנֵ֖י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei The sons חָ֑ם <S%H2526><s%> Cham; of Ham כּ֥וּשׁ <S%H3568><s%> kush Cush וּמִצְרַ֖יִם <S%H4714><s%> u-mitz-Ra-yim and Mizraim פּ֥וּט <S%H6316><s%> put Put וּכְנָֽעַן׃ <S%H3667><s%> u-che-Na-'an. and Canaan

וּבְנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> u-ve-Nei And the sons כ֔וּשׁ <S%H3568><s%> Chush, of Cush סְבָא֙ <S%H5434><s%> se-Va Seba וַחֲוִילָ֔ה <S%H2341><s%> va-cha-vi-Lah, and Havilah וְסַבְתָּ֥א <S%H5454><s%> ve-sav-Ta and Sabta וְרַעְמָ֖א <S%H7484><s%> ve-ra'-Ma and Raamah וְסַבְתְּכָ֑א <S%H5455><s%> ve-sav-te-Cha; and Sabtecha וּבְנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> u-ve-Nei And the sons רַעְמָ֖א <S%H7484><s%> ra'-Ma of Raamah שְׁבָ֥א <S%H7614><s%> she-Va Sheba וּדְדָֽן׃ <S%H1719><s%> u-de-Dan. and Dedan ס sa-Mek

וְכ֖וּשׁ <S%H3568><s%> ve-Chush And Cush יָלַ֣ד <S%H3205><s%> ya-Lad begat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- נִמְר֑וֹד <S%H5248><s%> nim-Rod; Nimrod ה֣וּא <S%H1931><s%> hu he הֵחֵ֔ל <S%H2490><s%> he-Chel, he began לִהְי֥וֹת <S%H1961><s%> lih-Yot to be a גִּבּ֖וֹר <S%H1368><s%> gib-Bor to be mighty בָּאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> ba-'A-retz. upon the earth ס sa-Mek

וּמִצְרַ֡יִם <S%H4714><s%> u-mitz-Ra-yim And Mizraim יָלַ֞ד <S%H3205><s%> ya-Lad begat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- ; לוּדִיִּים lu-di-yim כלוּדִ֧ים <S%H3866><s%> lu-Dim Ludim קוְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et עֲנָמִ֛ים <S%H6047><s%> 'a-na-Mim and Anamim וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et לְהָבִ֖ים <S%H3853><s%> le-ha-Vim and Lehabim וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et נַפְתֻּחִֽים׃ <S%H5320><s%> naf-tu-Chim. and Naphtuhim

וְֽאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et פַּתְרֻסִ֞ים <S%H6625><s%> pat-ru-Sim And Pathrusim וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et כַּסְלֻחִ֗ים <S%H3695><s%> kas-lu-Chim, and Casluhim אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which יָצְא֥וּ <S%H3318><s%> ya-tze-'U (of whom came מִשָּׁ֛ם <S%H8033><s%> mish-Sham in it פְּלִשְׁתִּ֖ים <S%H6430><s%> pe-lish-Tim the Philistines וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et כַּפְתֹּרִֽים׃ <S%H3732><s%> kaf-to-Rim. and Caphtor ס sa-Mek

וּכְנַ֗עַן <S%H3667><s%> u-che-Na-'an, And Canaan יָלַ֛ד <S%H3205><s%> ya-Lad begat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- צִיד֥וֹן <S%H6721><s%> tzi-Don Zidon בְּכֹר֖וֹ <S%H1060><s%> be-cho-Ro his firstborn וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et חֵֽת׃ <S%H2845><s%> Chet. and Heth

וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et הַיְבוּסִי֙ <S%H2983><s%> hay-vu-Si The Jebusite וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et הָ֣אֱמֹרִ֔י <S%H567><s%> ha-'e-mo-Ri, also and the Amorite וְאֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et הַגִּרְגָּשִֽׁי׃ <S%H1622><s%> hag-gir-ga-Shi. and the Girgashite

וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et הַחִוִּ֥י <S%H2340><s%> ha-chiv-Vi And the Hivite וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et הַֽעַרְקִ֖י <S%H6208><s%> ha-'ar-Ki and the Arkite וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et הַסִּינִֽי׃ <S%H5513><s%> has-si-Ni. and the Sinite

וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et הָאַרְוָדִ֥י <S%H721><s%> ha-'ar-va-Di And the Arvadite וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et הַצְּמָרִ֖י <S%H6786><s%> hatz-tze-ma-Ri and the Zemarite וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et הַֽחֲמָתִֽי׃ <S%H2577><s%> Ha-cha-ma-Ti. and the Hamathite ס sa-Mek

בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei The sons שֵׁ֔ם <S%H8035><s%> Shem, of Shem עֵילָ֣ם <S%H5867><s%> 'ei-Lam Elam וְאַשּׁ֔וּר <S%H804><s%> ve-'ash-Shur, and Asshur וְאַרְפַּכְשַׁ֖ד <S%H775><s%> ve-'ar-pach-Shad and Arphaxad וְל֣וּד <S%H3865><s%> ve-Lud and Lud וַאֲרָ֑ם <S%H758><s%> va-'a-Ram; and Aram וְע֥וּץ <S%H5780><s%> ve-'Utz and Uz וְח֖וּל <S%H2343><s%> ve-Chul and Hul וְגֶ֥תֶר <S%H1666><s%> ve-Ge-ter and Gether וָמֶֽשֶׁךְ׃ <S%H4902><s%> va-Me-shech. and Meshech ס sa-Mek

וְאַרְפַּכְשַׁ֖ד <S%H775><s%> ve-'ar-pach-Shad And Arphaxad יָלַ֣ד <S%H3205><s%> ya-Lad begat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- שָׁ֑לַח <S%H7974><s%> Sha-lach; Shelah וְשֶׁ֖לַח <S%H7974><s%> ve-She-lach and Shelah יָלַ֥ד <S%H3205><s%> ya-Lad begat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- עֵֽבֶר׃ <S%H5677><s%> 'E-ver. Eber

וּלְעֵ֥בֶר <S%H5677><s%> u-le-'E-ver And unto Eber יֻלַּ֖ד <S%H3205><s%> yul-Lad were born שְׁנֵ֣י <S%H8147><s%> she-Nei two בָנִ֑ים <S%H1121><s%> va-Nim; sons שֵׁ֣ם <S%H8034><s%> shem the name הָאֶחָ֞ד <S%H259><s%> ha-'e-Chad of the one פֶּ֗לֶג <S%H6389><s%> Pe-leg, [was] Peleg כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> ki in בְיָמָיו֙ <S%H3117><s%> ve-ya-Mav because in his days נִפְלְגָ֣ה <S%H6385><s%> nif-le-Gah was divided הָאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz, the earth וְשֵׁ֥ם <S%H8034><s%> ve-Shem name אָחִ֖יו <S%H251><s%> 'a-Chiv and his brother's יָקְטָֽן׃ <S%H3355><s%> ya-ke-Tan. [was] Joktan

וְיָקְטָ֣ן <S%H3355><s%> ve-ya-ke-Tan And Joktan יָלַ֔ד <S%H3205><s%> ya-Lad, begat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- אַלְמוֹדָ֖ד <S%H486><s%> al-mo-Dad Almodad וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et שָׁ֑לֶף <S%H8026><s%> Sha-lef; and Sheleph וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et חֲצַרְמָ֖וֶת <S%H2700><s%> cha-tzar-Ma-vet and Hazarmaveth וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et יָֽרַח׃ <S%H3392><s%> Ya-rach. and Jerah

וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et הֲדוֹרָ֥ם <S%H1913><s%> ha-do-Ram Hadoram וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et אוּזָ֖ל <S%H187><s%> 'u-Zal also and Uzal וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et דִּקְלָֽה׃ <S%H1853><s%> dik-Lah. and Diklah

וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et עֵיבָ֥ל <S%H5858><s%> 'ei-Val And Ebal וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et אֲבִימָאֵ֖ל <S%H39><s%> 'a-vi-ma-'El and Abimael וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et שְׁבָֽא׃ <S%H7614><s%> she-Va. and Sheba

וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et אוֹפִ֥יר <S%H211><s%> o-Fir And Ophir וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et חֲוִילָ֖ה <S%H2341><s%> cha-vi-Lah and Havilah וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et יוֹבָ֑ב <S%H3103><s%> yo-Vav; and Jobab כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all אֵ֖לֶּה <S%H428><s%> 'El-leh these בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei All these [were] the sons יָקְטָֽן׃ <S%H3355><s%> ya-ke-Tan. of Joktan ס sa-Mek
שֵׁ֥ם׀ <S%H8035><s%> shem Shem אַרְפַּכְשַׁ֖ד <S%H775><s%> 'ar-pach-Shad Arphaxad שָֽׁלַח׃ <S%H7974><s%> Sha-lach. Shelah
עֵ֥בֶר <S%H5677><s%> 'E-ver Eber פֶּ֖לֶג <S%H6389><s%> Pe-leg Peleg רְעֽוּ׃ <S%H7466><s%> re-'U. Reu
שְׂר֥וּג <S%H8286><s%> se-Rug Serug נָח֖וֹר <S%H5152><s%> na-Chor Nahor תָּֽרַח׃ <S%H8646><s%> Ta-rach. Terah
אַבְרָ֖ם <S%H87><s%> 'av-Ram Abram ה֥וּא <S%H1931><s%> hu that אַבְרָהָֽם׃ <S%H85><s%> 'av-ra-Ham. the same [is] Abraham ס sa-Mek
בְּנֵי֙ <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei The sons אַבְרָהָ֔ם <S%H85><s%> 'av-ra-Ham, of Abraham יִצְחָ֖ק <S%H3327><s%> yitz-Chak Isaac וְיִשְׁמָעֵֽאל׃ <S%H3458><s%> ve-yish-ma-'El. and Ishmael ס sa-Mek

אֵ֖לֶּה <S%H428><s%> 'El-leh These תֹּלְדוֹתָ֑ם <S%H8435><s%> to-le-do-Tam; These [are] their generations בְּכ֤וֹר <S%H1060><s%> be-Chor The firstborn יִשְׁמָעֵאל֙ <S%H3458><s%> yish-ma-'eL of Ishmael נְבָי֔וֹת <S%H5032><s%> ne-va-Yot, Nebaioth וְקֵדָ֥ר <S%H6938><s%> ve-ke-Dar then Kedar וְאַדְבְּאֵ֖ל <S%H110><s%> ve-'ad-be-'El and Adbeel וּמִבְשָֽׂם׃ <S%H4017><s%> u-miv-Sam. and Mibsam

מִשְׁמָ֣ע <S%H4927><s%> mish-Ma' Mishma וְדוּמָ֔ה <S%H1746><s%> ve-du-Mah, and Dumah מַשָּׂ֖א <S%H4854><s%> mas-Sa Massa חֲדַ֥ד <S%H2301><s%> cha-Dad Hadad וְתֵימָֽא׃ <S%H8485><s%> ve-tei-Ma. and Tema

יְט֥וּר <S%H3195><s%> ye-Tur Jetur נָפִ֖ישׁ <S%H5305><s%> na-Fish Naphish וָקֵ֑דְמָה <S%H6929><s%> va-Ke-de-mah; and Kedemah אֵ֥לֶּה <S%H428><s%> 'El-leh these הֵ֖ם <S%H1992><s%> hem like בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei These are the sons יִשְׁמָעֵֽאל׃ <S%H3458><s%> yish-ma-'El. of Ishmael ס sa-Mek

וּבְנֵ֨י <S%H1121><s%> u-ve-Nei Now the sons קְטוּרָ֜ה <S%H6989><s%> ke-tu-Rah of Keturah פִּילֶ֣גֶשׁ <S%H6370><s%> pi-Le-gesh concubine אַבְרָהָ֗ם <S%H85><s%> 'av-ra-Ham, Abraham's יָלְדָ֞ה <S%H3205><s%> Yal-dah she bare אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- זִמְרָ֧ן <S%H2175><s%> zim-Ran Zimran וְיָקְשָׁ֛ן <S%H3370><s%> ve-ya-ke-Shan and Jokshan וּמְדָ֥ן <S%H4091><s%> u-me-Dan and Medan וּמִדְיָ֖ן <S%H4080><s%> u-mid-Yan and Midian וְיִשְׁבָּ֣ק <S%H3435><s%> ve-yish-Bak and Ishbak וְשׁ֑וּחַ <S%H7744><s%> ve-Shu-ach; and Shuah וּבְנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> u-ve-Nei And the sons יָקְשָׁ֖ן <S%H3370><s%> ya-ke-Shan of Jokshan שְׁבָ֥א <S%H7614><s%> she-Va Sheba וּדְדָֽן׃ <S%H1719><s%> u-de-Dan. and Dedan ס sa-Mek

וּבְנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> u-ve-Nei And the sons מִדְיָ֗ן <S%H4080><s%> mid-Yan, of Midian עֵיפָ֤ה <S%H5891><s%> 'ei-Fah Ephah וָעֵ֙פֶר֙ <S%H6081><s%> va-'E-fer and Epher וַחֲנ֔וֹךְ <S%H2585><s%> va-cha-Noch, and Henoch וַאֲבִידָ֖ע <S%H28><s%> va-'a-vi-Da' and Abida וְאֶלְדָּעָ֑ה <S%H420><s%> ve-'el-da-'Ah; and Eldaah כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- All אֵ֖לֶּה <S%H428><s%> 'El-leh these בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei All these [are] the sons קְטוּרָֽה׃ <S%H6989><s%> ke-tu-Rah. of Keturah ס sa-Mek

וַיּ֥וֹלֶד <S%H3205><s%> vai-Yo-led begat אַבְרָהָ֖ם <S%H85><s%> 'av-ra-Ham And Abraham אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- יִצְחָ֑ק <S%H3327><s%> yitz-Chak; Isaac ס sa-Mek בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei The sons יִצְחָ֔ק <S%H3327><s%> yitz-Chak, of Isaac עֵשָׂ֖ו <S%H6215><s%> 'e-Sav Esau וְיִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> ve-Yis-ra-'El. and Israel ס sa-Mek

בְּנֵ֖י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei The sons עֵשָׂ֑ו <S%H6215><s%> 'e-Sav; of Esau אֱלִיפַ֛ז <S%H464><s%> 'e-li-Faz Eliphaz רְעוּאֵ֥ל <S%H7467><s%> re-'u-'El Reuel וִיע֖וּשׁ <S%H3266><s%> vi-'Ush and Jeush וְיַעְלָ֥ם <S%H3281><s%> ve-ya'-Lam and Jaalam וְקֹֽרַח׃ <S%H7141><s%> ve-Ko-rach. and Korah ס sa-Mek

בְּנֵ֖י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei The sons אֱלִיפָ֑ז <S%H464><s%> 'e-li-Faz; of Eliphaz תֵּימָ֤ן <S%H8487><s%> tei-Man Teman וְאוֹמָר֙ <S%H201><s%> ve-'o-Mar and Omar צְפִ֣י <S%H6825><s%> tze-Fi Zephi וְגַעְתָּ֔ם <S%H1609><s%> ve-ga'-Tam, and Gatam קְנַ֖ז <S%H7073><s%> ke-Naz Kenaz וְתִמְנָ֥ע <S%H8555><s%> ve-tim-Na' and Timna וַעֲמָלֵֽק׃ <S%H6002><s%> va-'a-ma-Lek. and Amalek ס sa-Mek

בְּנֵ֖י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei The sons רְעוּאֵ֑ל <S%H7467><s%> re-'u-'El; of Reuel נַ֥חַת <S%H5184><s%> Na-chat Nahath זֶ֖רַח <S%H2226><s%> Ze-rach Zerah שַׁמָּ֥ה <S%H8048><s%> sham-Mah Shammah וּמִזָּֽה׃ <S%H4199><s%> u-miz-Zah. and Mizzah ס sa-Mek
